programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: Broke, punchy and at odds with his son, boxer Rocky (Sylvester Stallone) trains a hungry contender, then must street-fight him. Starring Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: Retired Rockys (Sylvester Stallone) plan to re-enter the ring for a few small matches escalates into a full-fledged bout with the worlds reigning heavyweight. Starring Sylvester Stallone, Burt Young, Antonio Tarver.

programme.title: Power Book IV: Force
programme.desc: The mounting pressure for retaliation looms, as disastrous moves and shocking secrets shake the streets.

programme.title: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast
programme.desc: Growing up in Detroit alongside his brother Meech, Terry reflects on their journey; the Flenory family faced the threat of losing everything, pushing the brothers to the drug trade; however, success in the game often comes with deadly rivalries.

programme.title: Blood Quantum
programme.desc: The dead are coming back to life and almost all of Earths population are decimated due to a zombie virus, except for the isolated Mikmaq reserve of Red Crow, whose indigenous inhabitants are strangely immune to the zombie plague. Starring Michael Greyeyes, Elle-Maija Tailfeathers, Forrest Goodluck.

programme.title: At First Light
programme.desc: A close encounter with mysterious lights sends two teens on the run after one discovers she has extraordinary but dangerous powers. Starring Stefanie Scott, Theodore Pellerin, SaÃ¯d Taghmaoui.

programme.title: Oceans Twelve
programme.desc: To pay back casino boss Terry Benedict, Danny Ocean and his team of criminals plan an elaborate heist in Europe. Starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon.

programme.title: Oceans Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean and his gang hatch an ambitious plot for revenge after ruthless casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses Reuben Tishkoff, Dannys friend and mentor. Starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Dr Helen Magnus, a 158-year-old English scientist, seeks out extraordinarily-powered creatures, known as Abnormals.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Will and Henrys double date goes awry when Magnus insists they do a routine delivery of an Abnormal en route.

programme.title: Nelly and Simon: Mission Yeti
programme.desc: A private eye and a university research assistant search for the abominable snowman in the Himalayas. Starring Sylvie Moreau, Guillaume Lemay-Thivierge, Rachid Badouri.

programme.title: Howards End
programme.desc: A misunderstanding, a surprise visit and a stolen umbrella intertwine the lives of three families -- the Schlegels, the Wilcoxes and the Basts.

programme.title: Howards End
programme.desc: In the wake of Mrs. Wilcoxs death, her family is further thrown by her final request regarding Howards End; the Schlegels face eviction; the Schlegel sisters take up the cause of Jacky Basts husband.

programme.title: Howards End
programme.desc: Margaret receives an offer from Henry; Helen is distraught by the unfair fate of the Basts; the three families collide at a wedding; Henrys past is revealed.

programme.title: Howards End
programme.desc: Margaret refuses to punish Henry for past transgressions and resolves to uphold their engagement; Helen embarks on a trip around Europe with no explanation; she returns when she hears that Aunt Juley is sick with pneumonia.

programme.title: Step Dogs
programme.desc: Meatball, a wise cracking country dog, and Cassie, Hollywoods most pampered pet, meet when their owners get married. The two fight constantly until burglars break into their house and they must team up to protect their home. Starring Dylan Schmid, Brittney Wilson, Eliana Jones.

programme.title: Perfect High
programme.desc: A teens (Bella Thorne) life spirals out of control when she starts abusing painkillers and heroin with her new friends (Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla) from school. Starring Annabella Avery Thorne, Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla.

programme.title: Whale
programme.desc: A young boy is sent to live with his grandparents in a remote indigenous community. Starring Timmy Masso, Grace George, Joe Martin.

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: Akeelah, an 11-year-old girl living in South Los Angeles, discovers she has a talent for spelling, which she hopes will take her to the National Spelling Bee. Starring Laurence Fishburne, Angela Bassett, Keke Palmer.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A black Southern woman (Whoopi Goldberg) struggles to find her identity after suffering years of abuse from her father and others over 40 years. Starring Whoopi Goldberg, Danny Glover, Margaret Avery.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct. Starring Martin Lawrence, Will Smith, Tea Leoni.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech officially relocates to Atlanta in search of expanding BMF; Terry remains in Detroit to maintain the BMF enterprise and to start a new life for his family; Meech learns that the move to Atlanta will be full of pleasant and unpleasant surprises.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech focuses on expanding BMF into Atlanta while Terry balances maintaining BMF and his family in Detroit; Terry looks for ways to generate revenue for BMF, and Meech comes through with Colombian connects.

programme.title: Crash
programme.desc: A man (James Spader) and wife who get thrills from car accidents hook up with the head (Elias Koteas) of a group that stages famous wrecks. Starring James Spader, Holly Hunter, Elias Koteas.

programme.title: eXistenZ
programme.desc: The creator/tester (Jennifer Jason Leigh) of a corporeally invasive game must elude assassins with the help of a security guard (Jude Law). Starring Jennifer Jason Leigh, Jude Law, Willem Dafoe.

programme.title: Run This Town
programme.desc: A journalist and a political aide become entangled in a larger-than-life scandal. Starring Ben Platt, Mena Massoud, Nina Dobrev.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: Magnus and Tesla investigate a former Praxian stronghold and realize they may have stumbled upon secrets to the Vampiris race.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: In June 1944, members of The Five are recruited for a mission to Normandy, ahead of the landings; the Reich is using a powerful abnormal to power a weapon and the Allies cant land until the weapon is neutralized.

programme.title: Ballerina
programme.desc: A look at the Australian Ballets first aboriginal dancer and her impact on the industry. Featuring interviews, dance sequences, and archive footage that showcases how Ella remains grounded in her own culture while performing.

programme.title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver
programme.desc: A golden retriever with a flair for sports helps a boy (Kevin Zegers) handle football and the new boyfriend (Gregory Harrison) of the boys widowed mother (Cynthia Stevenson). Starring Kevin Zegers, Cynthia Stevenson, Gregory Harrison.

programme.title: Air Bud: Spikes Back
programme.desc: A dog that plays volleyball helps investigators solve a rash of mysterious crimes. Starring Robert Tinkler, Cynthia Stevenson, Katija Pevec.

programme.title: Night at the Museum
programme.desc: A night watchman (Ben Stiller) at a museum of natural history discovers that exhibits come alive after the building closes. Starring Ben Stiller, Carla Gugino, Dick Van Dyke.

programme.title: Clara
programme.desc: In a race to find intelligent life in the universe, an astronomer and his freethinking research assistant make an inexplicable discovery that changes how they see the world -- and each other. Starring Patrick J. Adams, Troian Bellisario, Kristen Hager.

programme.title: Breakaway
programme.desc: A young man is torn between his traditional Indo-Canadian family expectations and his dreams of playing hockey. Starring Russell Peters, Rob Lowe, Camilla Belle.

programme.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
programme.desc: After three nefarious farmers declare war on them, a sly fox (George Clooney) rallies his animal neighbors to fight back. Starring George Clooney, Meryl Streep, Jason Schwartzman.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: An image consultant transforms a tomboyish FBI agent into a beauty queen so she can work undercover to catch a terrorist. Starring Sandra Bullock, Michael Caine, Benjamin Bratt.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Two detectives uncover a conspiracy involving a drug kingpin while trying to stop the trafficking of Ecstasy in Miami. Starring Martin Lawrence, Will Smith, Jordi MollÃ .

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Jack the Rapper Weekend turns into chaos when Meech, Glock, the MKs, and the Red Dogs collide; Meech is determined to foster BMF in Atlanta, starting by purchasing a home with the help of his father.

programme.title: BMF
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Meech returns to Detroit upon Colombian connect Locos request to pick up weight for BMF; the amount of weight is insurmountable for him to handle alone, thus he solicits help from Terry and the Detroit team.

programme.title: Indian Horse
programme.desc: A Canadian First Nations boy survives in a residential school in the 1970s. Starring Sladen Peltier, Forrest Goodluck, Ajuawak Kapashesit.

programme.title: Laurence Anyways
programme.desc: In the 90s, Laurence tells his girlfriend, Fred, that he wants to become a woman; they confront the prejudices of their friends, ignore the council of their families and brave the phobias of the society they offend. Starring Melvil Poupaud, Suzanne Clement, Nathalie Baye.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: A colleague vanishes amid unexplained disappearances in Normandy, France; Magnus and her team run into a military blockade during their investigation.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: With no sanctuary in sight, Helen and Will find themselves living suburban lives that neither of them recognize.

programme.title: One Day in the Life of Noah Piugattuk
programme.desc: A government agent tries to get an Inuit man and his children to move to settlement housing. Starring Kim Bodnia, Apayata Kotierk, Benjamin Kunuk.

programme.title: Drink Slay Love
programme.desc: A 16-year old vampire discovers she has the ability to withstand sunlight. Sensing an opportunity to round up new victims, her family enrolls her in high school, where her who-cares attitude quickly makes her the coolest girl around. Starring Cierra Ramirez, Angelique Rivera, Gregg Sulkin.

programme.title: The Grand Seduction
programme.desc: Residents of a small fishing community in Newfoundland charm a doctor into becoming the towns full-time physician in order to secure a vital factory contract. Starring Brendan Gleeson, Taylor Kitsch, Liane Balaban.

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: Born with facial differences that, up until now, have prevented him from going to a mainstream school, Auggie Pullman becomes the most unlikely of heroes when he enters the local fifth grade. Starring Julia Roberts, Owen Wilson, Jacob Tremblay.

programme.title: The Games Maker
programme.desc: Ivans love of board games transports him into the competitive world of game invention. Starring Joseph Fiennes, Tom Cavanagh, Megan Charpentier.

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: During the 1960s, Cambridge University student and future physicist Stephen Hawking (Eddie Redmayne) falls in love with fellow student Jane Wilde (Felicity Jones). Despite a diagnosis of a devastating disease, he and Jane break new scientific ground. Starring Eddie Redmayne, Felicity Jones, Emily Watson.

programme.title: Lion
programme.desc: Accidentally separated from his family as a child, Saroo Brierley (Dev Patel) returns to India 25 years later to find them. Starring Dev Patel, Rooney Mara, David Wenham.

programme.title: Silver Linings Playbook
programme.desc: An unexpected bond begins to form between a man trying to rebuild his life and a young woman promising to help him reunite with his estranged wife. Starring Bradley Cooper, Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: A therapist (Robin Williams), a mathematician and working-class roughs vie for the soul of a janitor (Matt Damon) with a genius IQ. Starring Matt Damon, Robin Williams, Ben Affleck.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry rediscover the Black Mecca of Atlanta; both brothers learn that the process of breaking into the scene in Atlanta will not be as easy when they are met with the old guard who wants to retain.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech plans to travel to St. Louis to link up with J-Pusha; he hopes to build business in St. Louis and expand BMF; Terry returns to Detroit to welcome the new addition to the family.

programme.title: Bright Leaf
programme.desc: Backed by a rich madam (Lauren Bacall), a Southerner (Gary Cooper) ruins a tobacco tycoon with a cigarette-making machine. Starring Gary Cooper, Lauren Bacall, Patricia Neal.

programme.title: The Carey Treatment
programme.desc: A Boston doctor (James Coburn) hunts a killer to clear a colleague charged with an abortion-related manslaughter. Starring James Coburn, Jennifer ONeill, Pat Hingle.

programme.title: Coma
programme.desc: A doctor (GeneviÃ¨ve Bujold) links her hospitals high coma rate to a black market in vital organs. Starring GeneviÃ¨ve Bujold, Michael Douglas, Elizabeth Ashley.

programme.title: The Love Light
programme.desc: An American (Mary Pickford) working as a lighthouse keeper in World War I Italy unwittingly weds an enemy soldier. Starring Mary Pickford, Evelyn Dumo, Fred Thomson.

programme.title: Umberto D
programme.desc: A lonely old man struggles to maintain his dignity while leading a meager existence with his dog as his only companion. Starring Carlo Battisti, Maria-Pia Casilio, Lina Gennari.

programme.title: Brothers in the Saddle
programme.desc: A cowboy (Tim Holt) tries to reform his outlaw brother (Steve Brodie) and finally shoots him in the shoulder. Starring Tim Holt, Steve Brodie, Richard Martin.

programme.title: Edge of the City
programme.desc: A labor boss (Jack Warden) harasses a longshoreman (Sidney Poitier) and his fugitive white friend (John Cassavetes). Starring John Cassavetes, Sidney Poitier, Jack Warden.

programme.title: Edge of the City
programme.desc: A labor boss (Jack Warden) harasses a longshoreman (Sidney Poitier) and his fugitive white friend (John Cassavetes). Starring John Cassavetes, Sidney Poitier, Jack Warden.

programme.title: Intruder in the Dust
programme.desc: An attorney in a small Southern town reluctantly takes on the case of a black farmer accused of murder. Starring David Brian, Claude Jarman Jr., Juano Hernandez.

programme.title: Take a Giant Step
programme.desc: Based on Louis S. Petersons play about a black teenager coping with life in a predominantly white society. Starring Johnny Nash, Estelle Hemsley, Ruby Dee.

programme.title: Say Amen, Somebody
programme.desc: Filmmaker George T. Nierenberg surveys gospel music, featuring "Mother" Willie Mae Ford Smith and "Professor" Thomas A. Dorsey.

programme.title: Freedom on My Mind
programme.desc: Filmmaker Connie Field and Marilyn Mulford profile the Mississippi voter registration project from 1961-64.

programme.title: The Autobiography of Miss Jane Pittman
programme.desc: A 110-year-old former Louisiana slave (Cicely Tyson) reminisces about her life and society from the Civil War to germinating civil rights. Starring Cicely Tyson, Odetta, Richard Dysart.

programme.title: King: A Filmed Record... Montgomery to Memphis
programme.desc: The tribute features newsreel clips of the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr., from 1955 to 1968, including his "I Have a Dream" speech.

programme.title: I Heard It Through the Grapevine
programme.desc: James Baldwin revisits the settings of civil rights struggles of the 1960s in the Deep South. Starring James Baldwin, David Baldwin.

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: The civil-rights leader (Denzel Washington) rises from criminal to crusader, undergoing a religious conversion while jailed. Starring Denzel Washington, Angela Bassett, Albert Hall.

programme.title: Uptight
programme.desc: Black militants building up an arsenal of weapons in preparation for a race war are betrayed by one of their own. Starring Raymond St. Jacques, Ruby Dee, Frank Silvera.

programme.title: The Murder of Fred Hampton
programme.desc: The circumstances surrounding the murder of Black Panther Fred Hampton by Chicago police.

programme.title: Black Panthers
programme.desc: The activities of the Black Panther Party as its members fought for the freedom of imprisoned co-founder Huey P. Newton.

programme.title: Raton Pass

programme.title: Heartland - Endings and Beginnings
programme.desc: Amy fights to form a team of horses before competing against a rival trainer.

programme.title: Heartland - Steal Away
programme.desc: When a horse repeatedly escapes, Amy blames Georgie and Jade, but she soon realizes that the horse has a special skill.

programme.title: Heartland - Walk a Mile
programme.desc: Amy tries to help a family whose team of Percherons ran astray during a hay ride.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - A Special Love
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark encourage a mentally challenged boy to compete in the Special Olympics.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - A Special Love
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a young couple adopt a mentally challenged boy.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - For the Love of Larry
programme.desc: A dog tries to lead Jonathan and Mark to his owners, a father and son trapped in a wrecked car.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Sound of Children
programme.desc: A pregnant Mary wants Adam and his wealthy Bostonian father to mend their relationship through reconciliation.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Lake Kezia Monster
programme.desc: The children plot to scare Mrs. Oleson into returning an old womans (Hermione Baddeley) home.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - Barn Burner
programme.desc: Charles and Joe Kagan are jurors in the trial of a bigot accused of torching a barn and assaulting Andy.

programme.title: Heartland - The Family Tree
programme.desc: Georgies life may completely change when a door to her past is opened.

programme.title: Heartland - The Pike River Cull
programme.desc: Jack and Amy help a friend in Pike River when the threat of a cull looms over a herd of wild horses.

programme.title: Heartland - The Heart of a River
programme.desc: Amy and Ty try desperately to save the wild horses; Lou and Peter join forces to fight the charges; Georgies future at Heartland is threatened.

programme.title: So You Said Yes
programme.desc: The owner (Kellie Martin) of a bridal shop falls in love with the son of her chief competitor, then must fend off the womans attempts to sabotage the relationship.

programme.title: My Boyfriends Dogs
programme.desc: After arriving at a small diner with her three dogs, a runaway bride (Erika Christensen) recounts her story about the ongoing search for Mr. Right.

programme.title: Like Cats And Dogs
programme.desc: Spencer and Lola couldnt be more different. Hes a cat person, and she loves dogs. When a reservation mix-up lands them -- and their pets -- in the same vacation house, they have to find a way to get along without killing each other.

programme.title: Love at First Bark
programme.desc: A single woman with a new, out of control German shepherd turns to a handsome dog trainer for help. As they make progress with the dog, she realizes she may be developing feelings for the trainer.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Anything for Love
programme.desc: Nathan and Elizabeth exchange secrets; Rosemary and Lee pitch Lucas an idea for the future of Hope Valley.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - The Mountie Way
programme.desc: Elizabeth receives a sentimental surprise in time for Little Jacks first day of school; Nathan trains a new Mountie cadet; Rosemary and Lee make a decision.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - You Get What You Give
programme.desc: When the comic book craze sweeps Hope Valley, Elizabeth teaches her students through nature; Rosemary launches a radio show and Lucas meets a new political player.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - All That Glitters
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Nathan uncover Olivers secret; Rosemary worries Lee has a secret of his own; Allies interest is piqued when Earl Wyatt returns to town.

programme.title: Heartland - The Family Tree
programme.desc: Georgies life may completely change when a door to her past is opened.

programme.title: Heartland - The Pike River Cull
programme.desc: Jack and Amy help a friend in Pike River when the threat of a cull looms over a herd of wild horses.

programme.title: Heartland - The Heart of a River
programme.desc: Amy and Ty try desperately to save the wild horses; Lou and Peter join forces to fight the charges; Georgies future at Heartland is threatened.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Another Kind of War, Another Kind of Peace
programme.desc: The father (Ernest Borgnine) of a dead veteran rebels when his sons Vietnamese family tries to immigrate.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Thats Our Dad
programme.desc: Two orphans face coldheartedness when they ask their favorite childrens TV host (Ned Beatty) to adopt them.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Love at Second Sight
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark pose as recreation directors to help an angel on a difficult assignment in a retirement community.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - Enchanted Cottage
programme.desc: Adam becomes depressed when Mary announces that she can distinguish between light and dark; the family is thrilled.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - Someone Please Love Me
programme.desc: Away from home on a buying trip, Charles faces an emotional problem when a lonely woman and her children turn to him for affection.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - Mortal Mission
programme.desc: Charles and Jonathan set out on a search for medicine when members of their families contract anthrax.

programme.title: Heartland - The Silent Partner
programme.desc: A client reveals that Peter turned down a job offer, leaving Amy in a difficult position.

programme.title: Heartland - Broken Heartland
programme.desc: Amy is invited to do a horse clinic in Montana, so she and Ty decide to take a road trip.

programme.title: Heartland - Cowgirls Dont Cry
programme.desc: Tim has a problem student at his new rodeo school; reluctant Amy is forced into wedding planning with Lisa.

programme.title: Recipe for Love
programme.desc: A woman (Danielle Panabaker) falls for a television chef (Shawn Roberts) while ghostwriting his cookbook.

programme.title: High Flying Romance
programme.desc: Music teacher Hannah finds unexpected love with a widower after he and his daughter move back to town and participate in the annual kite festival.

programme.title: Love at First Dance
programme.desc: Hope is tasked with teaching Manhattans former most eligible bachelor how to dance for his extravagant wedding. As the dance lessons progress, complications ensue when feelings begin to develop between the student and the instructor.

programme.title: Country at Heart
programme.desc: A struggling country singer meets a Nashville songwriter in need of inspiration. Teaming up to write a song, their work gets complicated but results in both a hit song and true love.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Dancing Teens
programme.desc: Elizabeth helps Allie plan a birthday dance,and Nathan struggles with Allie growing up; Rosemary and Bill team up again to investigate a train robbery; Lucas lends Edie a hand.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Moms the Word
programme.desc: Elizabeth develops a new method of teaching; Nathan goes undercover; a familiar face returns to Hope Valley with an unlucky heiress in tow; Lucas and Lee face their differences.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - When Autumn Leaves Begin to Fall
programme.desc: Allie and Oliver discover a threat; Rosemary invites the kids to debate Lucas on the radio; Bill interrogates a suspect with an old friends help; Elizabeth fights a cold.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Dance the Night Away
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Nathans date night leads to an undercover operation at a glamorous party; Lucas and Edie grow closer over cards; Rosemary holds auditions for a play.

programme.title: Black Rain (1989)
programme.desc: Two New York police detectives (Michael Douglas, Andy Garcia) take an underworld upstart back to Osaka, Japan.

programme.title: Cop Land (1997)
programme.desc: The sheriff (Sylvester Stallone) of a small New Jersey police community confronts key men (Harvey Keitel, Ray Liotta) on both sides of a law-enforcement cover-up.

programme.title: Gone Baby Gone (2007)
programme.desc: Two private investigators (Casey Affleck, Michelle Monaghan) tread dangerous ground as they scour the Boston underworld for a kidnapped child.

programme.title: Barrons Cove (2024)
programme.desc: A man with a violent past kidnaps the boy he holds responsible for his sons death. As he grows closer to uncovering the truth, hes left to wonder whether his pursuers are really seeking to protect the boy, or merely the secrets he keeps.

programme.title: I See You (2019)
programme.desc: Strange occurrences plague a small-town detective and his family as he investigates the disappearance of a boy.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction (1987)
programme.desc: A New York lawyer (Michael Douglas) with a wife (Anne Archer) and daughter sleeps with a client (Glenn Close) whose lust turns to hate.

programme.title: Wildcat (2021)
programme.desc: A captive reporter must figure out a way to escape from the militants who ambushed her convoy in the Middle East.

programme.title: Good Kill (2014)
programme.desc: An Air Force drone pilot (Ethan Hawke) begins to question the ethics of dropping bombs on Afghanistan from the safety of his post in Las Vegas.

programme.title: Drop Zone (1994)
programme.desc: A U.S. marshal (Wesley Snipes) turns sky diver to nab a hijacker (Gary Busey) and his parachuter gang planning to invade the DEA.

programme.title: Changing Lanes (2002)
programme.desc: An attorney and a recovering alcoholic have a car accident which swiftly escalates into an ongoing, bitter feud.

programme.title: The Last Castle (2001)
programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

programme.title: The Haunting (1999)
programme.desc: A parapsychologist and three others stay in a house reputed to be the site of many awful tragedies and paranormal events.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Scream 2 (1997)
programme.desc: A masked killer continues to pursue a California student (Neve Campbell) and her friends at an Ohio college.

programme.title: Scream 3 (2000)
programme.desc: Murders draw a young woman (Neve Campbell), a reporter (Courteney Cox Arquette) and an ex-policeman (David Arquette) to the set of a movie inspired by horrific events that they survived.

programme.title: Scream 4 (2011)
programme.desc: The Ghostface Killer returns with a vengeance when self-help author Sidney Prescott (Neve Campbell) arrives in Woodsboro on the last stop of her book tour.

programme.title: Undisputed (2002)
programme.desc: An undefeated world-champion prizefighter, who is convicted of rape and sent to prison, must confront and fight the reigning prison boxing champion.

programme.title: Undisputed II: Last Man Standing (2006)
programme.desc: Imprisoned in Russia, a man (Michael Jai White) relies on his street-fighting skills while fighting boxers in the ring.

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption (2010)
programme.desc: Uri Boyka is an inmate trapped in the toughest prison in the world. He is ready to make his comeback in a lethal boxing competition for a shot at freedom.

programme.title: Changing Lanes (2002)
programme.desc: An attorney and a recovering alcoholic have a car accident which swiftly escalates into an ongoing, bitter feud.

programme.title: Villain (1971)
programme.desc: A razor-wielding London thug (Richard Burton) robs a payroll with his gang; his pimp boyfriend (Ian McShane) has the alibi.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: Eric Clapton: Life in 12 Bars (2017)
programme.desc: Eric Clapton is widely renowned as one of the greatest performers of all time. His isolated pursuit of his craft, and fear of selling out, served as a catalyst for his evolution as an artist.

programme.title: Under the Stadium Lights (2021)
programme.desc: Facing doubts and personal challenges both on and off the field, it takes the guidance of their team chaplain and a surrogate father figure for players on the Abilene Eagles to realize what they can achieve when they stand united.

programme.title: Parallel (2024)
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Globe-trotting archaeologist Indiana Jones races the Nazis for possession of a legendary religious artifact.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: In 1935 archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford), a lounge singer (Kate Capshaw) and a Chinese orphan (Ke Huy Quan) search for mystical stones stolen from an Indian tribe.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)
programme.desc: Archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford) rescues his kidnapped father (Sean Connery), and the two race the Nazis to find the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008)
programme.desc: Indy (Harrison Ford) and a young adventurer (Shia La Beouf) must ferret out a powerful artifact and keep it out of the hands of a deadly Soviet agent (Cate Blanchett).

programme.title: Guns Up (2025)
programme.desc: After a job goes horribly wrong, a man who moonlights as a mob henchman has one night to get his family out of the city while keeping his dark secret hidden.

programme.title: The Comeback Trail (2020)
programme.desc: Indebted to a mobster, a desperate producer tries to "accidentally" kill an aging movie star for an insurance scam. However, he soon begins to realize that the film theyre shooting is a masterpiece in the making.

programme.title: Serpico (1973)
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD.

programme.title: Defiance (2008)
programme.desc: In 1941 three refugee brothers (Daniel Craig, Liev Schreiber, Jamie Bell) turn a daily struggle to survive into a personal battle to save their people from the Nazis.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: Love and Monsters (2020)
programme.desc: A young man and his traveling companions battle an array of monsters during an 80-mile journey to find the woman he loves.

programme.title: Pixie (2020)
programme.desc: Pixie sets out to avenge her mothers death and attempts a heist that will give her the means to leave her small-town life behind. When the plan goes horribly wrong, shes forced to team up with a pair of misfits who are clearly in over their heads.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead (1999)
programme.desc: After too many years on the job, an EMS paramedic (Nicolas Cage) begins an emotional descent during 56-hour tour.

programme.title: Inside Angling
programme.desc: We go back in time, where people are friendly and truly still love their neighbor, history is cherished and Queen Elizabeth reigns supreme. St Helena Island is a true gem dropped into the Atlantic somewhere between Brazil and Africa.

programme.title: Wild Fly
programme.desc: When we heard word of aquatic research taking place in South Africas largest game reserve, the Kruger National Park, a real opportunity to encounter fish in a wild habitat, that had not yet seen a fly, was immediately seized upon.

programme.title: Wild Fish Wild Places
programme.desc: Returning to the wilds of Alaska, Denis and Uncle Rod cant resist the pull of Yakutat - a place theyve fished before but couldnt stay away from. The pair brave cold, rain, and rough terrain to chase down some of the biggest steelhead in the world.

programme.title: Fishing the Wild With Mike Robinson
programme.desc: Joined by local spearfishing champion, Elisabeth, who only uses a pole spear the crew learns some of the secrets of the Arctic. Mike breaks down a halibut and takes it back to his restaurant in England.

programme.title: Hooked on Africa
programme.desc: Wallow in the luxury game sanctuary of Sausage Tree Camp, knowing that these untapped waters hold some beasts of legendary proportions. With a wealth of fauna, literally on your doorstep, experience a real taste of Africa.
